name: Georgiana Bones and the Hapless Heist
name_original: Georgiana Bones and the Hapless Heist
description:
***Only the Windows version has been uploaded to itch.  I may transfer other builds (see GameJolt page) with an update and/or sequel of this very rough 2-week game and first Unity project.

CREATED FOR 2021 ADVENTURE JAM

A thief searches for lost Templar relics in a zany adventure inspired by Indiana Jones, Monty Python, and whatever else comes to mind.

Credits:

  • 9 verb interface and and PowerQuest game engine developed by PowerHoof.
  • Interface design is credited to LucasArts.
  • All music is by Donovan Jonk.
  • Voice acting is by Erika Sanderson and Rich Keeble.
  • Character respawn sound is from Eric Matyas (soundimage.org).
  • Attempted parody of familiar works from pop culture like Indiana Jones and Monty Python.
